mapper.select: select e.id, e.insideCode, ddo.occupationName as occupation, e.company, ddi.industryName as industry, e.occAddress, e.occZIP, e.startYear, ddd.dutyName as duty, ddc.casteName as caste, e.annualIncome from zh_employment e LEFT JOIN zh_dd_occupation ddo on e.occupation = ddo.occupationCode LEFT JOIN zh_dd_industry ddi on e.industry = ddi.industryCode LEFT JOIN zh_dd_duty ddd on e.duty = ddd.dutyCode LEFT JOIN zh_dd_caste ddc on e.caste = ddc.casteCode where insideCode = #{insideCode}
